User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

isModerator.description: Indicates if the user has moderator privileges.

MoodEntry.title: Mood Entry
MoodEntry.description: Represents a single mood entry for a user.

value.description: A numerical representation of the mood (e.g., 1-5).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the mood was logged.

trigger.description: The primary reason for the mood (e.g., Academics, Social).

triggerNote.description: A user-written note for additional context on the trigger.

GratitudeEntry.title: Gratitude Journal Entry
GratitudeEntry.description: A single entry in a user's gratitude journal.

date.description: The date of the entry in YYYY-MM-DD format.

entry.description: The text content of the gratitude entry.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the entry was created.

SafetyPlan.title: User Safety Plan
SafetyPlan.description: Stores a user's personalized safety plan for moments of crisis.

copingStrategies.description: A user-written text of personal coping strategies.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in the group chat.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

userName.description: The display name of the user.

message.description: The content of the chat message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

isModerator.description: Whether the sending user is a moderator.

mediaUrl.description: The URL of any shared media.

mediaType.description: The MIME type of the shared media (e.g., 'image/jpeg').

replyTo.description: Information about the message being replied to.

/userProfiles/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for a user.

/userProfiles/{userId}/moodEntries/{entr.description: Stores a user's mood entries over time.

/userProfiles/{userId}/gratitudeJournal/.description: Stores a user's daily gratitude journal entries.

/userProfiles/{userId}/safetyPlan/userPl.description: A single document containing the user's safety plan.

/groupChatMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages for the anonymous peer-to-peer group chat.
